Competency Question / Fact: A (project) process has a cost, which is measured in a certain currency
A task belongs to a certain process
A task is related to one or several (construction) elements
A task includes progress and priority information
A task can have a date of creation, og beginning and of end
A task can have predecessor tasks
A task requires certain resource types
A work order is related to a process
A work order has resources assigned
